description: VAPI eval queue clear button: Edge Function fix and improved confirmation UX.

changes.description: Researchers can now clear the VAPI evaluation queue from ComputeHub using a new 'Clear queue' button that actually works. Previously the button silently failed because the RLS policy on the queue table had no DELETE permission for users; the fix routes the delete through a new Edge Function that uses the service role key.

The 'Clear queue' confirmation now appears as a sonner toast with Cancel and 'Clear queue' action buttons instead of a browser window.confirm dialog. Implemented by replacing the window.confirm call with a toast.warning() call using sonner's action/cancel API.
